title: OCE DOMINION
body:
BRING DOMINION INTO OUR LIVES AT OCE!!!!!! EVER SINCE I LEFT NA IT IS ALL I WANT IN LIFE!!!!!!! PLEASE LISTEN AND HEAR MY PLEA AS I AM AS SAD AS {{champion:32}}  




replies.body:
It's not worth your while. OCE community is nothing like NA, we are on a much smaller scale. 

1. It wasn't too long ago that ranked wasn't even 24/7, it ended at 4 am and started at 8 am, because there were not enough players. 

2. We don't even have Normal Draft pick on here because apparently "our player base cannot support it", although I believe this one is massive bull shit.

3. Twisted Treeline is only on Thursday - Saturday for a few hours each day. 

Queue times would be just be so long, it wasn't too long ago that team builder queue times were 3+ hours, now imagine dominion, it would be literally days!

The best way is to start up a custom game, and call it "Dominion Queue for OCE come join!" or something, maybe post it on the boards and get a little community going.
